channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Apple’s new AirTag has more range and a better speaker
item.description: Apple has revealed a new AirTag that comes with the company's upgraded ultra wideband chip, allowing for more precise location tracking. It has the same $29 for one or $99 for a four-pack price as the AirTag it's replacing, while the new chip powers Apple's Precision Finding feature, which uses haptic, visual, and audio feedback […]

item.title: Apple : la deuxième génération du AirTag trouve enfin son chemin
item.description: Dans la rumeur depuis des années maintenant, le nouvel AirTag est officiel ! Cette nouvelle génération du traqueur d'objets d'Apple n'a rien d'une révolution, mais plusieurs changements notables sont au rendez-vous sous le capot blanc.

item.title: After 5 years, AirTag 2 Arrives With Improved Range and Louder Speaker
item.description: Apple's official item tracker is now even better.

item.title: Fnac et Darty lâchent une nouvelle vague de promotion à l’approche de la dernière démarque des soldes
item.description: Une nouvelle semaine commence, et les bonnes affaires continuent ! La dernière démarque des soldes d’hiver approche chez Fnac et Darty, avec encore de nombreuses offres Tech disponibles en ligne. Smartphones, tablettes, ordinateurs… il est encore temps de profiter de réductions exceptionnelles avant la fin !

item.title: This 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is 33 percent off
item.description:
If you're looking to expand the storage on your Switch 2, the 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is on sale right now for 33 percent off, marked down to $80 from $120. With component prices skyrocketing these days, it's getting increasingly rare to see good storage on sale, and 512GB for $80 is a much better deal than you'll currently find directly from Nintendo.
The P9 boasts transfer speeds of up to 800MB/s, making moving games to the card that much faster. As for load times, in our testing we found that any microSD Express, the standard the Switch 2 requires, will offer roughly the sam...

item.title: Fritz!Box 5690 Pro review: This unusual Wi-Fi 7 router has helped me future-proof my home network with support for every network device I own
item.description: On the surface, the Fritz!Box 5690 Pro is a slightly quirky-looking router offering dual built-in modes for DSL and fibre for ultra-fast Wi-Fi 7 wireless networking. It also supports smart home and mesh networks.

item.title: The LG B5 OLED offers 'serious bang for your buck' — and Best Buy just slashed it to a record-low of $549.99 for a limited time
item.description: Grab the entry-level LG B5 OLED, which offers excellent picture quality and is fantastic for gaming, at its lowest-ever price in Best Buy's latest 48-hour flash sale.

item.title: Is Namecheap still cheap in 2026?
item.description: I take a look at Namecheap to find out if this company still offers some of the best cheap web hosting around

item.title: Taika Waititi Teases a New Tone For His ‘Star Wars’ Movie
item.description: Plus, rumored details about Disney's 'Power Rangers' revival.

item.title: Asus Zenbook Duo Review: A Stacked Laptop in More Ways Than One
item.description: Intel’s Panther Lake shines, but more than that, this laptop proves two screens are better than one.

item.title: As Marvel pivots back to the Avengers, Wonder Man goes its own way
item.description: When Marvel first announced that Avengers: Doomsday would be directed by the Russo Brothers and star Robert Downey Jr. as Doctor Doom, it seemed like the studio might be using the feature as a massive nostalgia play. Though the film will feature a number of characters from more recent projects like Thunderbolts* and The Fantastic […]

item.title: Intel Panther Lake laptop CPU review: call it a comeback
item.description: Intel's been talking the talk for months about its new generation of laptop chips, the first made on its long-anticipated 18A process. 18A is meant to steer Intel back toward bluer waters by making its chips better, and, if possible, attracting chip designers like Qualcomm and Nvidia to use Intel's foundries, not just its rival […]

item.title: Asus Zenbook Duo (2026) review: twice as nice — for a price
item.description: The most helpful thing you can add to any laptop for productivity is a second screen. That's why I love laptops like the Asus Zenbook Duo. Its twin 14-inch OLED displays are attached by a redesigned hinge that now holds them closer together and on a single plane, for a more seamless look than previous […]

item.title: Nvidia’s new AI weather models probably saw this storm coming weeks ago
item.description: Nvidia announced three new AI weather tools today. Together, they promise to improve the accuracy of weather forecasts while also making them accessible to more users.

item.title: What is the release date for Fallout season 2 episode 7 on Prime Video?
item.description: The second-to-last episode of Fallout season 2 is almost here – this is when it'll make its Prime Video debut.

item.title: Test de l’Asus Zenbook Duo (2026) : le Core Ultra X9 388H au firmament
item.description: L'Intel Core Ultra X9 388H se présente officiellement sous la forme de l'Asus Zenbook Duo, nouveau portable deux écrans du constructeur taïwanais.

item.title: Les astronomes n’en peuvent plus : un document révèle que les satellites d’Amazon menacent leurs recherches
item.description: La constellation de satellites Amazon Leo est menaçante pour les observations astronomiques. D'après des chercheurs, les engins seraient bien trop brillants et pourraient gêner les télescopes au sol, surtout s'ils se multiplient.

item.title: The EU is investigating Grok and X over potentially illegal deepfakes
item.description: Europe is probing Elon Musk’s X for failing to take action to prevent the spread of AI-generated sexually explicit images including child sexual abuse material (CSAM), regulators said in a press release. The European Commission’s investigation could result in “further enforcement steps” against X, not long after it levied a $140 million fine against the platform. “Sexual deepfakes of women and children are a violent, unacceptable form of degradation. With this investigation, we will determine whether X has met its legal obligations under the DSA [Digital Services Act], or whether it treated ri...

item.title: Pour les soldes, Amazon brade à moitié prix le Motorola Razr 60, qui devient le moins cher des smartphones pliables de 2025
item.description: Si vous êtes tenté par un smartphone à clapet pendant les soldes, le Razr 60 de Motorola pourrait bien vous convaincre. Son prix est même plus intéressant grâce à cette offre des soldes 2026 sur Amazon : 461 euros contre 899 euros de base, grâce à une remise immédiate cumulée à un bonus reprise de 100 euros.

item.title: Namecheap in 60 minutes: launching a site on a budget
item.description: Can budget hosting provide the same performance and experience as premium options?

item.title: Our 'camera of the year' just hit a brand new record-low price — the Nikon Z5 II is great value right now
item.description: On the lookout for your next full-frame camera? Definitely consider this record-breaking £340 discount on the excellent Nikon Z5 II.

item.title: TurboTax Deluxe has been discounted to $45 ahead of tax season
item.description: Tax season is fast approaching, and unfortunately for 2026, Direct File isn't an option anymore. The free, government-provided service was shut down, so you'll need to look to other federal programs, including IRS Free File, to file your paperwork. If you don't qualify for Free File, TurboTax might be your best bet for a relatively cheap, efficient way to file your taxes. While it pains us to suggest you give money to a company that has spent decades lobbying to ensure America's tax system remains a nightmare, we can at least help you save a bit of cash if you've determined TurboTax is a neces...

item.title: The Disney+ Hulu bundle is down to $10 for one month right now
item.description: You have the best chance to save on streaming services during the holiday shopping season, but throughout the year, the occasional deal pops up that's worth considering. Case in point: this new Disney+ deal. New and eligible returning subscribers can sign up for the Disney+ Hulu bundle (with ads) for $10 for one month of access. That's $3 off the usual price of the bundle for one month, and more than 58 percent off if you consider the cost of each service individually (Disney+ at $12 per month and, separately, Hulu also at $12 per month). We'd be remiss if we didn't mention that this isn't qui...

item.title: Meilleurs iPhone : la sélection des modèles à acheter (et ceux à éviter) en 2026
item.description: Faut-il acheter le dernier iPhone ou bien opter pour un modèle plus ancien ? C'est à cette question que nous allons tenter de répondre dans ce guide d'achat. Quel iPhone choisir ? Voici les conseils et recommandations de la rédaction de Frandroid.

item.title: Intel délaisse-t-il les PC grand public au profit de l’IA ? La firme clarifie sa stratégie
item.description: Intel cherche l'équilibre. Durant l'annonce de ses derniers résultats financiers, le géant américain a promis de ne pas trop dégarnir sa part de production vouée au grand public… même si la firme admet bien volontiers mobiliser l'essentiel de ses capacités de production pour honorer un maximum de commandes liées à l'IA.

item.title: Don’t wait for the rumored OLED MacBook Pro – here are 3 reasons why the M5 MacBook Pro could be a wiser upgrade
item.description: Apple’s M6 MacBook Pro could be a risky, expensive option. Opting for the M5 model might be a safer bet.

item.title: Deepfakes sexuels : la Commission européenne lance une enquête sur X et Grok
item.description: La Commission européenne tape du poing sur la table contre le réseau social d'Elon Musk. Bruxelles lance en effet une enquête formelle sur la génération d'images dénudées générées sans consentement par Grok, y compris à partir de photos d'enfants.

item.title: 'Simply irresponsible': Microsoft confirms it will give your BitLocker encryption keys to the FBI if asked - but there is a way to keep your data private
item.description: Moved called "simply irresponsible" - but there is a way to protect your private data.

item.title: Proton VPN reveals major Linux makeover – both for GUI and CLI users
item.description: Proton has released a set of updates for both its Linux GUI and Linux CLI VPN apps. Here's all you need to know.

item.title: The Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones are 35 percent off
item.description:
It's that time of year where a great pair of headphones double as earmuffs and a current sale will ensure you get a great quality — and good looking — option. One of our favorite wireless headphones for 2026 is available for 35 percent off. Amazon is offering the first-generation Bose QuietComfort Ultra Bluetooth Headphones for $279, down from $429. Since coming out last April, they've become our choice for best noise-canceling wireless headphones. Notably, the sale is only available in the headphone's nice limited edition Deep Plum model.
We gave the Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones an...

item.title: The best gear to upgrade your home theater setup
item.description: A good home theater setup goes beyond just having the right TV (although that certainly does help a lot). Getting the right sound for your space, the right lighting and making sure your streaming gear is up to date are all things that can go a long way to making your setup feel premium.And don’t think that just because you’re not hosting movie night every weekend that a good home theater setup is a waste. Whether your family is full of cinephiles, you love playing video games with your kids or you plan on hosting friends to watch Super Bowl 2026, the right home theater equipment can make your ...

item.title: Stop chasing “green” jet fuel
item.description: Waste-based aviation options can end food versus fuel tradeoffs for a truly circular economy.

item.title: Tempted by the IKEA donut lamp? The upgraded Philips Hue Flourish might be an even better smart home buy
item.description: In the market for a new smart lamp for your table? Philips Hue is updating one of its models.
